text: "I'm Over You" is a song by Martine McCutcheon. Written by the songwriting duo Carl Sturken and Evan Rogers, the single became McCutcheon's second best- selling single (behind the 1999 number-one "Perfect Moment"), charting at number two on the UK Singles Chart in November 2000 behind the Spice Girls' "Holler"/"Let Love Lead the Way". The song also found modest success in Ireland, reaching number 23. ==Track listings== CD single # "I'm Over You" (Radio Edit) – 3:42 # "I'm Over You" (Xenomania Club Mix) – 7:25 # "Perfect Moment" (Sleaze Sisters Anthem Mix) – 7:30 12" single Side A # "I'm Over You" (Xenomania Club Mix) – 7:25 # "I'm Over You" (G-A-Y Mix) – 6:24 Side B # "Perfect Moment" (Sleaze Sisters Anthem Mix) – 7:30 # "Rainy Days (Sleaze Sisters Anthem Mix) – 8:00 Maxi single # "I'm Over You" (Radio Edit) – 3:42 # "I'm Over You" (Xenomania Club Mix) – 7:25 # "I'm Over You" (Xenomania Disco Mix) – 6:08 # "I'm Over You" (G-A-Y Mix) – 6:24 # "Perfect Moment" (Sleaze Sisters Anthem Mix) – 7:30 # "Rainy Days" (Sleaze Sisters Anthem Mix) – 8:00 # "Falling Apart" (Live Recording) – 4:40 ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !scope="col"|Chart (2000) !scope="col"|Peak position |- !scope="row"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |12 |- |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 songs Category:2000 singles Category:Songs written by Carl Sturken and Evan Rogers
